Surrey Fire and Rescue Service Consultation

Surrey Fire and Rescue Service is proposing changes to some services. Have your say by 26 May 2019.

Recycled garden waste makes for the ideal gnome

There's no place like gnome in the winter, but now it's time to head outdoors and get your garden prepped for summer. And what better way to get some gnome comforts than to recycle your garden waste and turn it into compost to help new things grow?

Register to Vote

Register before 12 April to vote in the 2019 Local Elections. All you need is five minutes and your National Insurance number.

Council Strategy 2019-24

The Council Strategy, which sets out out vision, guiding principles and priorities for the next five years, was approved at Full Council in February. The Strategy will come into effect from 1 April 2019.

Transform Leatherhead Update

A vision for redeveloping the Swan Centre, the latest on our High Street Study and a full update on our transport model, just three of the topics to be presented on the night. Join us on 7 March 2019, 7pm at The Leatherhead Theatre to find out more and ask your questions of the project team in our live Q&A.

Join Team Mole Valley at Specsavers Surrey Youth Games

Young people in Mole Valley have until Friday 22 May to take advantage of a fantastic opportunity to sign up to fun, free training sessions for this year's Specsavers Surrey Youth Games.
